originalText.text: Austin is absolutely fantastic!  He is extremely knowledgeable and made me feel so comfortable right away.  Austin also provided excellent follow-up maintenance tips which resulted in huge improvements with my skin.  Highly recommend!  Have not found anything nearly as good anywhere in the city.  A+

originalText.text: I had a really good experience. The office staff and Dr. Goldstein were really nice. The office is magazine worthy but most importantly the services they provide are amazing.

text.text: I had a really good experience. The office staff and Dr. Goldstein were really nice. The office is magazine worthy but most importantly the services they provide are amazing.

originalText.text:
I’ve been seeing Chris for laser hair removal and aesthetics for about a year, and I could not be more satisfied with the results and the service. Chris is extremely professional and knowledgeable, so I am always confident I will be happy with his work. The laser work has saved me so much time spent on personal maintenance and looks a million times better than I could have imagined too.

Furthermore, Chris is really clear and thorough when explaining care instruction whereas others tend to rush you out the door. He’s also really consultative and honest with setting realistic expectations. You can tell he really cares and wants to see you achieve great results.

Could not recommend him and Bespoke more!

originalText.text:
I seriously can not recommend Bespoke, and especially Chris enough. The office has an incredibly welcoming,  positive atmosphere and that is also embodied through the knowledge, and caring nature that Chris provides.

I’ve been seeing him for laser hair removal for a while now and he throughly went through any concerns i had, and preformed the procedure with ease. I’ve never felt felt more confident in my body and thats all thanks to Chris!!!

originalText.text:
Two reviews in one...

What could have been a one-off consultation and treatment for a medical concern has turned into an enduring patient care relationship, quite literally an extension of my primary care.

As a gay male, I know all to well the pains of dealing with a non-LGBTQ practitioner who thinks that as long as you're tested for HIV, they've done their job. Dr. Goldstein is a completely different experience. He and his team are extremely personable, welcoming, and knowledgeable. Pretty much always on time, always available for questions over email, and always takes time to talk to you before getting right into business.

As a final note, yes he is out of network, but even when I didn't have OON coverage, his office worked with me for affordable self-pay care.

This second review is for Chris.

If you're seeking answers to your aesthetic concerns, Chris is incredible at what he does. Quite knowledgeable, similarly makes himself available to you for any questions, takes time to understand your goals and works with you to achieve them. Whether it's laser hair removal or chemical peels, Chris will keep it real with you and create a plan that's right for you.
